tp:docstring.p: This media description interface provides a method of signalling support for RTP Header Extensions, documented by A General Mechanism for RTP Header Extensions (RFC 5285).
For more details on the General Mechanism for RTP Header Extensions and how to use them, one should refer to RFC 5285.

tp:struct.name: RTP_Header_Extension
tp:struct.tp:docstring: A struct defining a RTP Header extension.

tp:member.name: Direction
tp:member.tp:docstring: Direction in which the Header Extension is negotiated.

tp:member.name: Parameters
tp:member.tp:docstring: Feedback parameters as a string. Format is defined in the relevant RFC.

property.name: HeaderExtensions
property.tp:docstring: A list of remote header extensions which are supported.
